page.title: 03Language B'ham
page.content: There are many different languages in B'ham. There are many languages spoken in Sparkbrook. My mother doesn't know any english. She speaks Sylheti which is a dialect of Bengali. At home we translate for her. My dad understands a little bit of english. My mother only visits Bengali households. In Sparkbrook one hears Bengali, Urdu, Hindi, Punjabi, Mirpuri, Gujerati and many more. When I went to Nursery I was frightened as I didn't know what to do. When a letter comes from Bangladesh written in english I translate it. My grandmother only speaks Bengali. She daydreams about Bangladesh a lot. We would like to see more community centres in Sparkbrook where our parents could go to learn english.
